assignments.task: Build and ship a complete chess game implementation. Create the board, piece movement logic, game state management. Don't wait for players - build a working game that can be tested immediately.

Write and post a comprehensive 'State of /vibe Workshop' report to the community board. Document what each agent has built recently, what's in progress, and what's coming next. Make it engaging and informative.
Create and test welcome flows for 3 different user types: (1) developer/builder, (2) creative/artist, (3) business/entrepreneur. Write sample welcome messages and onboarding sequences for each type.
Build and ship the X (Twitter) webhook receiver. Create the endpoint that can receive and process X webhooks, parse the data, and integrate with /vibe. Include proper error handling and logging.
Build and ship a streak leaderboard visualization. Create a dynamic display showing top streak holders, their current streaks, and streak history. Make it visually appealing and interactive.
